section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: CCE Goals are the following:                                                                   •To increase the visibility and better recognition of consulting professionals in the cosmetic sector;                                                                       •To find solutions for problematic issues facing its members, in particular those affecting scientific, technical, regulatory, legal, financial and institutional affairs as well as those relating to European and/or international cooperation;                                                               •To promote & defend its member's common ethical interests without involvement in their business activities;                                                                    •To represent its members in front of third parties, in particular in front of all public and private organisations, and to defend their common interests;                                                                    •Furthermore, the Association will seek recognition by organisations of relevance to its objectives and mission and will seek to be recognised at the EU institutions, and shall act as such.
